main.bio: Hey, ðŸ‘‹ I'm Dharun Narayanan, a B.Tech Computer Science undergraduate student in AMRITA VISHWA VIDYAPEETHAM-COIMBATORE. I love exploring new technologies and often amazed by the progress we as a human species have made so far in recent years (apart from the in-box charger part!!). I have started reflecting my ideas and thougths through the medium of words recently so spelling and grammer mistakes are very often. You can write me back if you spot any.

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
education.description: I am pursuing my under-graduation studies with major in CSE(Computer Science & Engineering). I have taken courses like DSA, OOPs, Flutter, Dart, Web Design over the years and have better understanding of these subjects.

I have completed my higher secondary education with major subjects as Physics, Chemistry, Maths & Computer Science with 89% merit. During my time at school, I have developed interest in problem solving and algorithimic thinking in computer science which helped me to improve my understanding of any problem and also my mathematical skills to actually solve the problems.
